response.overview: An Exploration of the Rise and Fall of Adolph Hitler and the Third Reich!  Contents: HITLER: ANECDOTES, MYTHS & LIES  1. THE CAUSES OF A MISTAKE - 1920-1937 2. THEY WILL NOT FIGHT BY DANZIG - 1938-1939 3. A LUCKY GAMBLER - 1939-1940 4. THE SUPREME LEADER - 1940-1941 5. TO WIN OR TO WIN - 1941-1942 6. HE WILL NEVER RETURN - 1942-1945  THE WORLD AT WAR: FROM HITLER TO HIROSHIMA  1. EUROPEAN THEATER OF OPERATIONS - part 1 2. EUROPEAN THEATER OF OPERATIONS - part 2 3. PACIFIC THEATER OF OPERATIONS - part 1 4. PACIFIC THEATER OF OPERATIONS - part 2  U-BOATS: HITLER'S SHARKS  1. GENESIS - 1906-1940 2. THE GOOD TIMES - 1940-1941 3. THE SOUND OF THE DRUM - 1942-1945
response.title: Hitler: The Untold Story
